snp1.7:11.1: Both Norman and Bodhi add a term suggesting transgression here, in line with the commentary and the apparent sense. I don’t, as I suspect the text is corrupt. Could diss be duss?
snp1.7:25.4: https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/matanga#purana | also https://archive.org/details/dli.ernet.51815/page/147/mode/2up?view=theater where sovāga harisena appears in uttaradhyayana
